task.title: Investigate and fix relay message delivery delays/drops

events.content: RelayDebugger identified root cause in router.ts message delivery: RelayDebugger identified root cause in router.ts message delivery

raw.question: RelayDebugger identified root cause in router.ts message delivery
raw.chosen: RelayDebugger identified root cause in router.ts message delivery
raw.reasoning: Messages to unregistered agents are silently dropped without retry or queuing. This explains intermittent failures when agents disconnect or aren't fully connected yet.
